article.title: UN layout formatting specification for UBL Receipt Advice instances

section.title: Receipt advice formatting specification
section.para: This formatting specification describes a rendering of the UBL Receipt Advice document model numbered according to the United Nations Layout Key for Trade Documents guidelines for application for the 632 Goods Receipt form:

listitem.para: 632 Goods receipt: Document issued by a port, warehouse/shed, or terminal operator acknowledging receipt of goods specified therein on conditions stated or referred to in the document.

section.para: For a list of all formatting specifications and an overview of the documentation conventions, please visit the formatting specification home page.

section.title: Status
section.para: This specification has no formal status at this time. It should not be considered a reference interpretation of UBL documents. Feedback is sought from users of stylesheets that implement this formatting specification regarding suggestions for change for consideration by the OASIS UBL committees for incorporation into these formatting specifications.

Presentational semantics may never be formalized or normative in the UBL project due to differing international requirements and conventions for the presentation of information found in business documents. This document contains only examples from a few of what will probably be many available UBL stylesheet libraries.

section.title: Example rendering
section.para: The following is an example rendering that illustrates the position and decoration of the information items found in an instance of the document type:

section.title: Layout order and information
section.para: Items in this formatting specification are ordered roughly from the laid out fields on the form in the order left-to-right, top to bottom.
Certain descriptions are verbatim quotes from the United Nations guidelines document.

Important: the rendering of a number of fields is very simplified, reflecting a Western European interpretation of a subset of fields (as in names and addresses). User requirements need to be better understood for the level of granularity in these formatting specifications.

section.title: Namespaces
section.para: The following namespaces are mapped to the prefixes in the expressions below:

section.title: Miscellaneous information
section.para: The following information is unrelated to the visible fields of the form.

section.title: Document header information
section.para: This information shows up in the window-title bar of the HTML browser, and in the document title supported by some XSL-FO processors.

section.title: Main document and party information
section.para: Header information is associated with the form as a whole, not to the individual items of goods.

section.title: Seller
section.para: This field is intended to show the name and address of the sender of goods or the originator of the documents, as the case may be.
Note that only one of cbc:CountrySubentity and cac:CountrySubentityCode need be used, with preference to cbc:CountrySubentity if it exists.

section.title: Receipt advice reference
section.para: This number is a unique number assigned to the receipt advice by the buyer.

section.title: Despatch advice reference
section.para: This number is the unique number assigned to the corresponding despatch advice by the seller.

section.title: Date
section.para: This field states the date of the receipt advice.

section.title: Despatch advice date
section.para: This field provides the date of the corresponding despatch advice.

section.title: Buyer's reference
section.para: This field provides the buyer's reference to the original order.

section.title: Other reference
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the receipt advice.

section.title: Consignee
section.para: These fields are used to provide the name and address of the receiver of the goods involved in the transaction.
Note that only one of cbc:CountrySubentity and cac:CountrySubentityCode need be used, with preference to cbc:CountrySubentity if it exists.

section.title: Buyer
section.para: These fields are used to provide the name and address of the buyer of the goods involved in the transaction.
Note that only one of cbc:CountrySubentity and cac:CountrySubentityCode need be used, with preference to cbc:CountrySubentity if it exists.

section.title: Freight forwarder
section.para: These fields are used to provide the name and address of the freight forwarder involved in the transaction.
Note that only one of cbc:CountrySubentity and cac:CountrySubentityCode need be used, with preference to cbc:CountrySubentity if it exists.

section.title: Country of origin of goods
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the receipt advice.

section.title: Country of destination
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the receipt advice.

section.title: Delivery and transport
section.para: Transportation fields are header-like information and are applicable to the entire order.

section.title: Mode of transport
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the receipt advice.

section.title: Date of despatch
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the receipt advice.

section.title: Means of transport
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the receipt advice.

section.title: Place of despatch
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the receipt advice.

section.title: Vessel/flight no. and date
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the receipt advice.

section.title: Port/airport of loading
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the receipt advice.

section.title: Port/airport of discharge
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the receipt advice.

section.title: Place of delivery
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the receipt advice.

section.title: Delivery requirements
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the receipt advice.

section.title: Consignment information
section.para: The consignment information holds generic details and totals relating to all the goods items in the receipt advice.

section.title: Shipping marks; container number
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the receipt advice.

section.title: Number and kind of packages; description of goods
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the receipt advice.

section.title: Total gross weight (kg)
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the receipt advice.

section.title: Total cube (m3)
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the receipt advice.

section.title: Total net weight (kg)
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the Invoice.

section.title: Line item information
section.para: Line item information is associated with the individual item of goods in the receipt advice.

section.title: Item / Packages
section.para: The item field is the identification of the receipt line according to the buyer's system.
The first reference is the buyer's assigned reference to the line item.
The second reference is the seller's assigned reference to the line item.

section.title: Description
section.para: This provides a free text description of the line item.

section.title: Received quantity
section.para: This field provides the number of received item for the line item.

section.title: Short quantity / Rejected quantity
section.para: These fields provide the recipients response to the items received.
The recipient will confirm the number of missing items OR the number of rejected items.

section.title: Reject reason
section.para: This field provides the reason for a rejection, the rejection reason code should be translated into text for clarity.

section.title: Action
section.para: These fields provide the action to be taken for missing or rejected items, the shortage action code OR the rejection action code should be translated into text for clarity.

section.title: Summary information
section.para: Summary information is associated to the entire receipt advice and not to any individual line item.

section.title: Notes
section.para: This notes field is used for any free text information that relates to the entire receipt advice.

section.title: Name of signatory
section.para: This field provides the name of signatory in the receipt advice.

section.title: Place and date of issue
section.para: The above fields provide information relating to the date and place of issue of the receipt advice.
Note that only one of cbc:CountrySubentity and cac:CountrySubentityCode need be used, with preference to cbc:CountrySubentity if it exists.

section.title: Signature
section.para: This field is not currently being filled automatically as it is a manual entry.

section.title: Continuation page
section.para: The continuation page comprises only a copy of the document identification information described in and room for additional line item entries described in .
